ModMetaData.name: Revia Race - Facial Animation
ModMetaData.author: Vinzero
ModMetaData.description:
Adds facial animations to the Revia Race, using Nals Facial Animation and experimental mod.
Additions Include • New set of eyebrows • Five completely new sets eyes, exclusive to the Revia Race. • New bloody crying when at high pain levels. • Three completely new sets of Eyelids • Four new mouths. • Seven different facial features, including scaring and beauty marks.
NOT COMPATIBLE WITH MALE REVIA
